Thanks, TC Team Snapchat launches Bitmoji widget chat shortcuts for your homescreen Posted Zenefits founder Parker Conrad takes another crack at HR onboarding 
Now you can instantly start chatting with your best friends on Snapchat. Instead of digging a chat thread out of Snapchat, users can select their favorite friends, create Bitmoji widgets for them with their personalized avatars, and click them from their iOS Today screen or Android homescreen to launch straight into a chat with that friend. 
Snapchat first started testing this last week in Android beta but today it rolls out to everyone thanks to an iOS and Android app update. 
The feature could help Snapchat refocus on private messaging as Instagram and Facebook Messenger clone and steal usage from its Stories feature. 0
